          <title>
            <string language="fr">Formation d'organigramme du charbon</string>
            <string language="en">Formation of coal flowchart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung des Kohleflußdiagramms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do fluxograma de carvão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione del diagramma di flusso del carbone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός του διαγράμματος ροής άνθρακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del organigrama del carbón</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cet organigramme partiellement rempli montre les  processus dans la formation du charbon. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un exercice où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This partially filled flowchart shows the processes in the formation of coal.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le charbon</string>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">organigramme de charbon</string>
            <string language="en">coal flowchart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">formation de charbon</string>
            <string language="en">coal formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">énergie</string>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">carburant</string>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">stockage d'énergie</string>
            <string language="en">stored energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">arbres</string>
            <string language="en">trees</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses teilweise gefüllte Flußdiagramm zeigt 
die Prozesse in der Anordnung der Kohle. Dieses kann in einer 
beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este fluxograma parcialmente enchido mostra os 
processos na formação do carvão. Isto pode ser usado em um 
exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma di flusso parzialmente riempito 
mostra i processi nella formazione di carbone. Ciò può essere 
usata in un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μερικώς γεμισμένο διάγραμμα ροής εμφανίζει 
τις διαδικασίες στο σχηματισμό του άνθρακα. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este organigrama parcialmente llenado muestra los 
procesos en la formación del carbón. Esto se puede utilizar en
un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
